reviewText: ...to the book as a read-aloud.  Had debated this purchase but knew $3 was a bargain.  I chose to show the DVD to my students on the Smartboard with the sound muted.  I read aloud from my hard copy of the book while walking around the room.  Much more effective this way as I could pause the recording with my remote and ask probing questions.  All eyes were on the screen as I observed how the students were processing the text.
